channel.title: Simplified Lectures on Jurisprudence on Superphysics: A New Science
channel.description: Recent content in Simplified Lectures on Jurisprudence on Superphysics: A New Science

item.title: Introduction
item.description: The goal of justice is security from injury. A man may be injured as: A man As a man he may be injured in his body, reputation, or estate. A member of a family As a member of a family he may be injured as: a father a son a husband or wife a master or servant a guardian or pupil: This is considered as a family relation until the pupil can take care of himself.
